revised_title: The Excretory Organs of Amphioxus: A Comparative Study with Polychaete Worms
tldr: The author examines the excretory organs of Amphioxus and compares them to the nephridia of certain Polychaete worms. They find that the excretory organs of Amphioxus are essentially identical to the nephridia in function, segmental arrangement, and detailed histological structure. This study helps to better understand the evolutionary relationships between these organisms.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Comparative Anatomy
